entry.title: MORNING CONVERSATION 11.1.23

entry.title: Witchy Waters: Local paddleboarders take to the lake in costume
entry.summary: SUTHERLIN — Those taking a hike or kayaking Tuesday afternoon around the scenic Cooper Creek Reservoir in Sutherlin would have seen a peculiar, magical Halloween sight.

entry.title: Neewollah: Halloween festive spirits fill the Roseburg streets
entry.summary: Cartoons, creatures and characters from worlds apart gathered at the corner of Southeast Jackson Street and Southeast Douglas Avenue, accessorized from head-to-toe, ready to celebrate at Neewollah — an annual halloween parade in downtown Roseburg.

entry.title: FREEZE WARNING THROUGH 9:00 A.M. SUNDAY
entry.summary: October 29, 2023 6:45 a.m. A Freeze Warning remains in effect through 9:00 a.m. Sunday for much of southern Oregon. Forecasters at the National Weather Service said sub-freezing temperatures as low as 24 degrees are likely. The Warning area includes central Douglas County, Josephine and Jackson counties, and eastern Curry County. Forecasters said frost and...

entry.title: Sutherlin subdivision wins initial approval
entry.summary: SUTHERLIN — Plans for a new housing subdivision in Sutherlin have won preliminary approval from city officials, despite the opposition of homeowners who live nearby.

entry.title: Differences made through painting, weeding, trimming
entry.summary: Throughout Douglas County, starting promptly at 9 a.m., 15 groups of volunteers came together to help make a difference in their various communities through outdoor work under the surprisingly warm, late October sun.
